src:
Unggah Tutorial Makan Unik, Bocah SMA Ini Bikin Netizen Ngakak
02 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Foto: instagram

Jakarta - Seorang bocah SMA membuat heboh instagram. Ia mengunggah video tutorial cara makan yang justru malah mengundang tawa netizen. Seperti apa aksinya?Remaja pria bernama Muhammad Alif Aulidan ini hebohkan netizen lewat video tutorial makan. Ia membagikan beberapa tips cara makan namun dengan cara yang ngaco. Lewat instagramnya @gp_slopet, ada beberapa video yang berhasil mengocok perut.Alif yang tercatat sebagai pelajar di SMKN 1 Balikpapan ini membagikan tips makan bakso panas agar cepat dingin. Di awal video, Alif mengatakan sedang makan di kantin pak kumis.


Foto: instagram

Baca juga : Bikin Ngakak! Kejadian Kocak dan Aneh Ini Karena Buah Durian"Selamat pagi semuanya, hari ini kita makan pangsit di kantin Pak Kumis. Langsung saja kita rasain, panasnya telornya," kata Alif menirukan gaya review ala youtuber makanan.Merasa bakso yang disantapnya terlalu panas, Alif lantas mengambil bakso menggunakan garpu lalu langsung menyelupkannya ke dalam gelas isi es teh manis. Bakso yang berlumur es teh manis ini langsung dilahapnya sekaligus.Aksi inilah yang membuat banyak orang ngakak tak bisa menahan tawa. Video yang diunggah 21 Oktober lalu ini kemudian menjadi viral dan sudah dilihat lebih dari 27 ribu kali.Video ini bukan satu-satunya unggahan yang bikin ngakak. Alif juga melakukan review makanan di kantin lainnya. Tentu dengan aksi yang tak kalah kocak."Guys kita lagi makan di kantin Inyong ya. Ayo kita cicipi dulu, selamat makan semuanya," kata Alif.Di video ini Alif makan dengan cara tak biasa. Ia membubuhkan kecap pada nasinya lalu menyantapnya dengan menhempaskan wajah ke piring. Alhasil banyak nasi menempel di wajahnya.


Foto: instagram

Aksi bar-bar yang dilakukan Alif ini sudah dilihat lebih dari 30 ribu kali. Dan ratusan komentar pun dilontarkan untuk aksi nyelenehnya."Itu piring kaca lho, nggak sakit emang keningnya?" tanya satu netizen."Coba dong sampe piringnya pecah, berani nggak?" sahut netizen lain.Tapi disamping netizen yang ngakak melihat aksi ini, ada juga yang menganggap Alif bermain-main dengan makanan. Beberapa netizen berkomentar kalau Alif lebih baik menyantap makanannya dengan benar karena banyak orang masih kesulitan untuk makan.Baca juga : Bikin Ngakak! Restoran yang 'Gagal' Ini Bikin Pengunjung Jadi TertawaSimak Video "Dogkyu, Menu Makan Siang Anti Mainstream"[Gambas:Video 20detik](dvs/odi)
text:
Upload Unique Eating Tutorial, This High School Boy Makes Netizens Loud
02 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Photo: Instagram

Jakarta - A high school kid is making a scene on Instagram. He uploaded a video tutorial on how to eat which actually invited netizens to laugh. What is the action like? The teenage boy named Muhammad Alif Aulidan is stirring netizens through a video tutorial on eating. He shared some tips on how to eat but in an awesome way. Through instagramnya @ gp_slopet, there are several videos that managed to shuffle the stomach. Anlif who is listed as a student at SMKN 1 Balikpapan shares tips on eating hot meatballs to get cold quickly. At the beginning of the video, Alif said that he was eating in a mustache pack canteen.


Photo: Instagram

Also read: Making LOL! Hilarious and Weird Events This Is Because of Durian Fruit "Good morning everyone, today we eat dumplings in Mr. Mustache's canteen. Immediately we feel it, the heat of the eggs," said Alif imitating the style of a youtuber-style review of food. take meatballs using a fork and then immediately dip it into a glass of sweet iced tea. This meatball which is covered with sweet iced tea is directly devoured all at once. This action makes many people can't help but laugh. The video, which was uploaded on October 21, then became viral and has been viewed more than 27 thousand times. This video is not the only upload that makes loud. Alif also did food reviews in other canteens. Of course with no less hilarious action. "Guys we are eating in Inyong's canteen. Let's taste it first, have a nice meal," Alif said. In this video Alif eats in an unusual way. He put soy sauce on his rice and then ate it by slapping his face on the plate. As a result a lot of rice stuck to his face.


Photo: Instagram

The action of the bars by Alif has been seen more than 30 thousand times. And hundreds of comments were made for the action, "It's a glass plate, you know, doesn't it hurt?" one netizen asked, "Try to break the plate, don't you dare?" Another netizen said. But besides netizens who didn't see this action, there were those who thought Alif was playing with food. Some netizens commented that Alif is better to eat his food properly because many people still find it difficult to eat. Also read: Make You Laugh! This 'Failed' Restaurant Makes Visitors Laugh Seeing the "Dogkyu, Anti Mainstream Lunch Menu" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (dvs / odi)
